revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Review proofreading corrections and note revision
Reviewed proofreading corrections, added date note, added Bucke to handNote.
corrected date format in title; added call no., annotations
Proofread, correct, re-code postscript, and annotate Hannah Heyde, Martha and Jeff Whitman

body.p:
i got both of your letters one the last of last week and the other on mondayMonday i got one from Heyde yesterday tuesdayTuesday) saying hannaHannahh was improving but had a bad thumb but no fever i think its it's pretty hard to tell how she is by his letters but i think she must be quite smart he said she had the girl that they had when i was there
she was very good and thought very much of han and will doodo
very well for her i make no doubt)

well walterWalter dear we are getting along quite smart mattyMatty is improving but far from well the doctor is doctoring her throat with great sucsess success i think he has performed two moderate opperations operations on her throat) but O dear if you could hear her talk it would make me hoarse to talk a steady stream as she does when any one comes in to see her i dread to see any one come in i talk
and talk to her but it does no manner of good she gets almost offended at me Perbasco was here the other evening and staid stayed quite late and the way mats Matt's toung tongue went it certainly would have made me have had the headach headache to have talked such a length of time steady but so it is she went out the other day i said dont don't go to any place but i knew in reason she would so she went to saywards and stayed till dark
it was real chilly when she com come i said marthaMartha if ever any one tryed tried to not get well i think you doo do so that night she raised some blood not much but it frightened her staid stayed and talked till it got so late and then walked fast home that was the cause of it when we doo do every thing to have her comfortable it makes me real out of patience) Edd has been quite sick with billious bilious attack but is so he does a little now but looks very bad) off georgeGeorge has got a draw of the two houses they talk of building he got the furniture insured to day for 400 dollars

postscript.p: i am pretty smart at present i try to get along as easy as i can mattyMatty is very weak she cant can't do much neve never mind Walter it will be spring after a while
